fr:mainmatter.fr:p: I'm a PhD student at LIX working on formal methods for mobile robotics with Eric Goubault, Sylvie Putot and Luc Jaulin. I study the characterization of tasks in swarm robotics, linking with methods in distributed computing and the underlying structures in modal logics and topology.

Previously, I completed my masters/engineering degree in autonomous robotics in ENSTA Bretagne, where I worked with Luc Jaulin on interval methods for robot localization. Before that, I did a bachelors in computer science in UFRGS, where I worked in its robotics lab on hybrid methods for robot localization and monocular vision in loop closure.
